title: Who Will NATOâ€™s Next Secretary General Be?
description: The behind-the-scenes jockeying for who should succeed Jens Stoltenberg has begun in earnest, with a focus on women.
dc:creator: Steven Erlanger
media:description: Unless his term is extended, Jens Stoltenberg of Norway will step down from his post as secretary general of NATO in September. The battle lines in the contest to replace him have begun to form.
